Name: Light Breeze
Instructions: POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass. Stir and serve with straws.
Review: A Seabreeze based on anise rather than vodka, benefitting from aniseed depth and sweetness.
History: Created in 2000 by Simon Difford at the Light Bar, London, England (hence the name).
Nutrition: One serving of Light Breeze contains 256 calories
